siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Do you find yourself digging through email threads trying to find the version of a contract in which a specific change was introduced? Who proposed the change? Was it your lawyer, or your customer? If this pain is familiar, Version Story is here to help.
blogPost.body: Do you find yourself digging through email threads trying to find the version of a contract in which a specific change was introduced? Who proposed the change? Was it your lawyer, or your customer? If this pain is familiar, Version Story is here to help.
blogPost.title: Version Story - Git for lawyers
blogPost.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: 你是否发现自己在邮件中翻阅邮件线程，试图找到引入特定变更的合同版本？是谁提出的修改？是您的律师，还是您的客户？如果这种痛苦是熟悉的，版本故事在这里帮助你。
你是否發現自己在郵件中翻閱郵件線程，試圖找到引入特定變更的合同版本？是誰提出的修改？是您的律師，還是您的客戶？如果這種痛苦是熟悉的，版本故事在這裏幫助你。

previous.excerpt: Daily makes it easy to build real-time audio apps. We're a developer platform for audio and video APIs. Check out our Starter Kit with sample code for React, Android, ReactNative, and iOS. You can build audio fast, and scale with our secure infrastructure.
previous.title: Daily - Build audio apps in a weekend

localize.description: Daily使其能够轻松构建实时音频应用。我们是一个音频和视频API的开发者平台。查看我们的入门套件，其中包含React、Android、ReactNative和iOS的示例代码。您可以快速构建音频，并利用我们的安全基础设施进行扩展。
localize.tagline: 在一个周末内构建音频应用程序

localize.description: Daily使其能夠輕鬆構建實時音頻應用。我們是一個音頻和視頻API的開發者平臺。查看我們的入門套件，其中包含React、Android、ReactNative和iOS的示例代碼。您可以快速構建音頻，並利用我們的安全基礎設施進行擴展。
localize.tagline: 在一個週末內構建音頻應用程序
